thread.section_title: Melbourne Watch Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Melbourne Watch Company | melbournewatch.com.au
thread.title: Phillip
thread.title_full: Melbourne Watch Company reviewed by Phillip

author: Phillip
title: Phillip
text:
As a collector of many watches, I was curious to see the quality of their watches. The finish is very good indeed, a couple sharp edges but these will wear smooth to touch. Timing is spot on considering it is not out of Switzerland. I particularly like the dial with its multi layers and varying textures. It will be interesting to see how it wears in the long term.
Great value for a sub $1000 and even better it supports an Aussie company.
